sobook.description: 4-month internship as fullstack developer inside the SoBook company

trackap.description: 6-month part-time internship (2 days per week) inside Trackap. Worked as web developer

skipty.description: 6-month internship as web developer inside the Skipty startup

delpharm.job: packaging operator for Delpharm Lille, France
delpharm.description: 1 month fixed-term contract as a packaging operator in a pharmaceutical company.

epicture.name: Epicture
epicture.what: Project developed with react native for an Epitech's 3rd year project
epicture.description: Based on already existing app: Imgur, the purpose of the project is to remake a soft version of this app with its basic features using Imgur's API (Categories, add photos, takes photos, user profile, fav, like, comments, research, sort)

brawhalla.name: Brawhalla
brawhalla.what: Project developed with Unity in a context of a game jam within my university
brawhalla.description: For theme: 'Space', we went on a Super Smash Bros game like in the space. Having for only capacity a dash, the goal is to throw out of the viewport the other players

epitechJam.name: Epitech jam
epitechJam.what: Project develped with Unity in a context of a game jam within my university

gameOfLife.name: Game of life
gameOfLife.what: Project developed with Unity in the context of a game project at my Croatian university
gameOfLife.description: The Game of Life, is a cellular automaton devised by the British mathematician John Horton Conway in 1970. It is a zero-player game, meaning that its evolution is determined by its initial state. The game follows simple rules that define the living or dead state of a cell

apiSave.name: API save
apiSave.what: Project developed with nodeJS in a context of an internship project
apiSave.description: The purpose is to save the databases of clients on a company's server. The project is made of one server which stores the saves of each client as well as a unique API installed on each client's server, which creates the saves and send them to the storage server

about.title: About
about.description: Passionate about IT development and for creations. I have developed my skills within Epitech Lille French school. Loving visual design projects, before starting IT I loved learning drawing. I really appreciate working on web and video game projects. Besides IT, I have been a climber since I was around 10 years old. That is a very important activity to me because it allow me to relax, giving my best and keeping me in good shape.
